participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys socializing and exploring new cultures.
participant_1.background: I am looking for a place that is close to my family and friends, where I can enjoy a good beer. My major was American literature and education. I had a small party with my friends. I am an international businessman. I have a very toned body.

participant_2.name: Sophie Martin
participant_2.personality: Creative and thoughtful, loves to express herself through art and nature.
participant_2.background: I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family. I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths. I want to share my photography with the world. I eat healthy meals and cook at home to make sure I am making the best choices for my health. I like photography.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy photography and collecting interesting rocks.
What kind of rocks do you collect?
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
That's a great hobby! I love photography too. What kind of photography are you into?
I like taking pictures of nature and landscapes.
Oh, that's great! I like to take pictures of people.
Do you have any pictures you would like to share?
Sure, here's a picture of me with my family:
That's a great picture! You look like you have a lot of fun together.
Thanks! We do.
What kind of business are you in?
I'm an international business man.
That sounds interesting. What do you do?
I help companies grow their businesses internationally.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thanks! I try my best.
What's your favorite thing about your job?
I get to travel to different countries and meet new people.
That sounds really exciting!
It is
